code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./App.css';import{Analytics}from"@vercel/analytics/react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[userInput,setUserInput]=useState('');const[apiResponse,setApiResponse]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const metaTag=document.createElement('meta');metaTag.name="viewport";metaTag.content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0";document.head.appendChild(metaTag);},[]);const handleInput=event=>{setUserInput(event.target.value);};const handleSubmit=async event=>{event.preventDefault();const apiURL='https://lamini.zapto.org/generate/';try{const response=await fetch(apiURL,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({prompt:userInput}),rejectUnauthorized:false});if(!response.ok){const errorText=await response.text();console.error(`Error: ${response.status} - ${errorText}`);throw new Error(`Error: ${response.status}`);}const data=await response.json();console.log(data);setApiResponse(data.response);}catch(error){console.error("Caught an error:",error);alert(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Analytics,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"input-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form-container",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Type something Intelligent...",value:userInput,onChange:handleInput,className:"input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{alt:"generate",type:"submit",className:"button",children:"Generate"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"response-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{className:"response-box",value:apiResponse,readOnly:true,placeholder:"API Response will appear here..."})})]})]});}export default App;
